About Me

E-Mail: For security reasons, you must enable Javascript to view email

I am a graduate student at UCLA with planned graduation in the fall of 2025. My advisor is Mike Hill. I am interested in equivariant homotopy theory, particularly the algebra of Mackey/Green/Tambara functors.

Curriculum Vitae

Teaching

When teaching moved online due to the coronavirus, I shifted to posting information about classes and my office hours on the official Canvas sites for the classes. For a list of classes that I have taught, please see my CV.

Teaching Statement

Research Interests
